name: TENSEC FIGHTER
description:
BRIEF:

The experimental fighter craft AB-95X TENSEC has been deployed to combat the growing swarm of CESNET drones from the rebel Fibonacci faction. Its innovative one-touch control and unproven auto-fire mechanism may be difficult to tame, but a decorated ace pilot such as yourself is never the kind to back down from a challenge.

The craft is proven to interface well using the WASD keys, the left gamepad stick, or the dragging motion of a fleshy finger on a touchscreen.

Every move will engage the weapons system, which has yet to receive bespoke subzero cooling hardware. In the meantime, you’ll have to keep watch of the heat gauge or you may be caught empty-handed as the weapons system cools down for ten seconds! TENSEC is also made of experimental alloys made to improve maneuverability at the cost of durability. Ten hits may be enough to send you six feet under!

The enemy front launches in ten-second waves with a surplus of slower last-generation craft. Points will be given for every ten seconds you survive and every craft you down.

The future of our territory rests on you now. Good luck!

=====
